DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate persistence anti-HBs antibody 16 , 17 , 18 , 19 20 year administration first dose study vaccine . The Protocol Posting update order comply FDA Amendment Act , Sep 2007 . No additional subject recruit long-term follow-up study vaccine administer .
DOC.brief_title: LT F-up Study 16-20 Yrs After Vaccine Dose Hepatitis B With/Without HBIg Newborns HBeAg+ Mothers
DOC.detailed_description: The primary study evaluate reactogenicity , immunogenicity protective efficacy hepatitis B vaccine healthy neonate HBeAg positive mother administer without dose HBIg birth . The current study describes long term follow subject Y16 20 primary vaccination .
DOC.criteria: Subjects receive least one dose study vaccine primary study Written inform consent obtain subject blood sample visit
